title: Baked Potato 🥔 Wedges 😋 | Winter ❄️ Treats
content:
Snack recipe: Potato Wedges Servings: 3 Duration: 45 minutes Potato wedges loved by everyone 😃 they are very simple to make and I appreciate myself they’re so tasty as same as earlier. Potato wedges can prepare baked or fried, it’s the best side for dinner or party 🎊 time or as a winter snack at home 🏡. I baked these gorgeous wedges with simple seasoning ingredients they’re easily available at kitchen shelves. Any one can cook these wedges, they’re served in many restaurants with ranch/ ketchup/ red chilly sauce/ mayonnaise to dip 😋 Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Golden Potatoes - 3 - large sized - Cut as Wedges
  • Red paprika - 2 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Add in all ingredients in a mixing bowl
  • Combine well and make sure each potato wedge coated well with spices and oil
  • Marinate 10 minutes
  • Preheat oven at 400F or 200 C and bake them 40 minutes
  • When they’re done , takeout them and serve immediately
  • Potato Wedges are ready you can have them with any sauce as you like, I served them with tomato 🍅 ketchup
  • Happy Cooking and have a lovely 😊 day
